tool_description: This API returns vehicle information such as VIN, tag, vehicle year, make, model, type and color as available from permitted States.
title: Vehicle Search

api_list.name: /GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-search.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vehicle-search.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vehicle-search.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
